title: Experimental universal flu vaccine with an mRNA-based design enters trial
description: The phase I trial will test safety and efficacy in a small number of people.

title: Twitter sued over Saudi spying that allegedly landed popular user in prison
description: Saudi Arabia became a top shareholder while its spies infiltrated Twitter.

title: French painters inspire new insights into the physics of soap bubbles
description: It's one step closer to better control of bubble size, shape for practical applications.

title: Apple details upcoming AI-driven iOS 17 accessibility features
description: You'll be able to create an AI voice for yourself and more.

title: AI technology “can go quite wrong,” OpenAI CEO tells Senate
description: Advanced AI systems should require government licenses, GPT-4 maker's CEO says.

title: Wemo won’t fix Smart Plug vulnerability allowing remote operation
description: Tricking a plug with a too-long name could lead to buffer overflows, injections.

title: How hacking your Switch can lead to better Tears of the Kingdom frame rates
description: Pushing RAM clock past the limit eliminates memory bottlenecks in crowded scenes.

title: We can ID people from DNA that shows up in environmental studies
description: Advances in DNA sequencing mean privacy can be violated accidentally.

title: Google will start deleting inactive accounts after two years
description: Google says you'll get lots of emails before your account is deleted.

title: Feds say Apple engineer stole autonomous driving tech and fled to China
description: The engineer stole thousands of documents and fled to China, according to DOJ.

title: Samsung and LG have finally settled on an OLED TV deal, report says
description: Samsung long resisted OLED TVs but will reportedly team up with rival to catch up.

title: Replication of high-temperature superconductor comes up empty
description: Researchers create the same material, see no sign of any unusual behavior.

title: Drobo, having stopped sales and support, reportedly files Chapter 7 bankruptcy
description: Company posted in January that it had "transitioned to a self-service model."

title: Landmark crypto rules make exchanges liable for customer losses in EU
description: Sweeping regulations require licenses for all crypto providers.

title: NBC’s Peacock streaming service scores an NFL playoff game
description: The NFL is just now embracing streaming, and it's getting complicated.

title: Review: Framework Laptop’s 13th-gen Intel upgrade helps fix its battery problem
description: But for upgraders, the AMD Ryzen board will probably feel more transformative.

title: Tesla’s “Full Self-Driving” sees pedestrian, chooses not to slow down
description: Fan is gleeful about video of beta Full Self-Driving mode breaking traffic laws.

title: Cargo, passengers, even campers—Mercedes-Benz has a new EV van platform
description: Coming in 2026, Van.EA will be able to support a wide range of van applications.

title: Microsoft is scanning the inside of password-protected zip files for malware
description: If you think a password prevents scanning in the cloud, think again.
